content: I have behind-the-ear (BTE) hearing aids from Phonak, and I'm currently using size 13 batteries. I'd like to order a multipack of 6, and I don't have a preferred brand. By the way, I've been relying on these hearing aids a lot lately, especially since I've been doing guided breathing sessions with my Fitbit, and I really need them to be functioning properly for my upcoming meetings.
